body: Forth Story: ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀MC's⠀father⠀divorced⠀and⠀got⠀married⠀again⠀ten⠀years⠀ago. A year he suicided, and with his dead, her mother's health state started to deteriorate until she passed away too. MC took the role of her step-sister's guardian as he was her only relative left. At the start of the story she moved to her new step-brother's house, went to take a shower, asking to MC if he can help her washing her body. MC got carried away in the process and they ended having the seks. Unfortunally she was filming everything with a hidden camera so in the end she ended up having a new slave to play with. And yes, probably something similar happened to her father, and that was the reason for his suicide. =====================================================================================================================

Same goes with the third story, not a lot to say about: Looks like at the start a few men started to get found dead. Turns out that the girl in this story (which also suffered from child abuse until her father was found dead too) lures men offering compensated dates, and then poisoning them at the end. 
=====================================================================================================================
Now that I think about it, the comments section will be a bit of a mess, since by the end the chapter summaries will be in descending order. Well, whatever. Second Story:

The second chapter is one of the ones that I liked the most, although in terms of story it doesn't have a lot going on. The story is about a girl which parents died in an fire, so his uncle took her as her guardian. In the first pages we learn about that as well as hearing some disturbing stuffs from the girl like "The food at the funeral was delicious, I wish we had one every day".⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ When⠀they⠀go⠀to⠀sleep⠀she notices that he is angry, so she does she did with her father every night. In the rest of the chapter we see the fruit of the training that her father gave to her in exchange for her allowance. And at the end of the chapter she tells his uncle that she was the culprit of the arson. The girl set the house on fire because her father stopped giving her her allowance as he was going throug financial problems. ⠀=====================================================================================================================

@Blacknight69 Fine, I will do it myself (well, not really, I just used an OCR and translator to try to understand what happened, if someone is planning to translate it go ahead please :p), here is the gist of the first story, at some point I will probably write up about the others too: .                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          In the first pages we see the main guy entering a pet shop, there seems to be a rumor that this shop let's you practice zoophilia, and he is specifically looking for a Panda. A page later we get to know more about this building. The first floor is a pet shop called Meteor, and in the second floor works as a cram school, but in reality this is only a facade as at night this works as a brothel.

MC founds the girl he was looking for and start going to business. After they were done (page 13) the girl tells him she noticed that he was holding back and that he doesn't need to do it so later on things start to get more intense. in page 18 MC notices a mark around her wrist and she comments that it was done by a previous customer who tied the ropes to tightly. She start to about how this person was a Hedge Fund Manager that came every day and liked to behave like a baby.
 
At page 20 I didn't really understood if either he used that information to get beneficial treatment or just realized that he couldn't really pay this service every day out of his pocket without raising suspicions, the point is that he found some account of a company the he could use to pay for it (as it was extemely expensive).

After that there is not a lot of story left, things continue to scale up. At some point she shows up with an eyepatch and so we learn that she is being abused by her father at home. Next page the guy gets in posession of some kind of acid that crystalizes when in contact with your body and makes you body itch, and some pills that works as medicine for this acid.

At page 34 she is happy that the guy finally "showed his true colors" and wants to continue going further to "erase the marks left by her father". Which in the end doesn't happen as they got caught after the enterteinment budget grew up to a grand total of 200 million yen.
hope it gets translated at some point | 347401

Those anal gapes were fantastic. The bar censoring is weird on this one. It's almost pointless but just enough there to be annoying. It seems like it would be pretty easy to decensor, though.
